Html:
Hi There!

I created a ATL Server Web Service With Visual Studio 2005 Wizard and chanded the project settings to support CLR:oldSyntax.

Generating WSDL Web Service and consuming it, works fine on XP with IIS 5.1.

On Vista with IIS 7, only works fine when i compile the project without CLR option. With the CLR, the WSDL isn't generated. 

I need this option on, because i use managed code.

On vista i have installed all the requisites needed to ISAPI Extensions. I have checked all the options needed, like i have seen on some forum post's about IIS7 and ISAPI.

This is a bug on vista ? there's some missing dll, setting or other thing ?

 

Thanks
